name: JavaScript
description: A versatile scripting language used primarily for web development.

name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

name: Node.js
description: A runtime for executing JavaScript on the server-side.

name: Python
description: A high-level programming language known for its readability and wide use in data science.

name: HTML
description: The standard markup language for creating web pages.

name: CSS
description: A style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.

name: MongoDB
description: A NoSQL database program that uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas.

name: Git
description: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code.

name: Bootstrap
description: A front-end framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites.

name: TypeScript
description: A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript.
